name: 洪子逸
objective:
藉由服務導向系統之本質與內涵之定義，使學生了解服務系統之規劃策略、設計、與作業面之運作考量，達成一個有效的服務系統，並滿足顧客之最終需求。同時，課程中亦加入適當之國內、外服務系統之個案分析，使學生了解相關之成功實施個案之精華所在。
The course focuses on the definitions and contents of service oriented system and investigates the planning, design, and operational perspectives of these service systems to effect. The course provides cases to help students get the insights of their successful operational decisions.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Project Initiation
Week 3 Project Management
Week 4 Requirements Determination
Week 5 Use Case Analysis
Week 6 Process Modeling
Week 7 Data Modeling
Week 8 Moving into Design
Week 9 Midterm Exam
Week 10 Architecture Design
Week 11 User Interface Design
Week 12 Program Design
Week 13 Data Storage Design
Week 14 Moving into Implementation
Week 15 Transistion to the New System
Week 16 The Movement to Objects
Week 17 Case Study & Discussion
Week 18 Final Project
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 30%
Final Project: 40%
Class Participation: 30%
materials: Dennis, A., Wixom, B., & Roth, R. (2006). System Analysis and Design, 3rd Ed., Wiley.
